duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative support to the General Manager (GM), Energy Research and Innovation.
Coordinate all office and administrative support duties including answering the telephone, making arrangements for visitors, processing expense reports, and preparing travel arrangements.
Manage the GM’s calendar and schedule, including scheduling appointments with senior management inside and outside of Phillips 66.
Maintain various distribution lists and submit work orders and IT service tickets.
Manage office and printer supplies, and coordinate event planning for special events and meetings.
Understand and ensure compliance with corporate policies and procedures, and work collaboratively with other administrative assistants on the team for back-up support.
Assist with special projects and complete other administrative tasks as assigned by the team and supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent
